benchmark.name: vocoder
benchmark.desc: Vocoder for bitrate reduction in speech
benchmark.description: Application that decodes a .wav file such that speech transformations can be smoothly applied to it (pitch, for instance) to modify some of its properties without affecting other speech characteristics. Output is then re-encoded back into the .wav format

impl.desc: Extra run time on cluster probably a hang so removed Extra compile time for raw: is borderline at 1200sec
